segment.source: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: Log File for the Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: The log file for the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client captures detailed information about operations and error conditions.
segment.target: The log file for the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client captures detailed information about operations and error conditions.

segment.source: You can use it when you are verifying functionality and when you are troubleshooting issues.
segment.target: You can use it when you are verifying functionality and when you are troubleshooting issues.

segment.source: When the App-V Client is first installed, the log file is created by default in the location shown in the following table.
segment.target: When the App-V Client is first installed, the log file is created by default in the location shown in the following table.

segment.source: The location of the log file is new for Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.5, although the location will not be changed if the client is upgraded from an earlier version.
segment.target: The location of the log file is new for Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.5, although the location will not be changed if the client is upgraded from an earlier version.

segment.source: Provides general information about App-V Client operations and errors.
segment.target: Provides general information about App-V Client operations and errors.

segment.source: Use this log as a starting point for troubleshooting App-V Client errors.
segment.target: Use this log as a starting point for troubleshooting App-V Client errors.

segment.source: Log file location for either the Desktop Client or the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services):
segment.target: Log file location for either the Desktop Client or the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services):

segment.source: C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Application Virtualization Client: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003
segment.target: C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Application Virtualization Client: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003

segment.source: C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Application Virtualization Client: Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008
segment.target: C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Application Virtualization Client: Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008
